title: Red pesto chicken and vegetable skewers

ingredients.item: 2 essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Fillets, cubed
2 tbsp Waitrose Red Chilli Pesto with Tomato
250g pack LOVE life Barley, Wheatberries, Spelt & Rice

instructions.step: Place the chicken, courgettes, pepper, onion and tomatoes in a­ large bowl. Add the pesto and toss ­together well.
Thread onto 8 short metal skewers and grill or barbecue over a medium heat for 15-20
minutes, turning frequently until the chicken is lightly browned and cooked through with no pink meat remaining.
Heat the cooked grains according to pack instructions and serve with the chicken and vegetable skewers and the ­salad.
